import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { storeRemoveProduct, incrementQuantity, decrementQuantity } from '../state/cartSlice'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router'; export default function Cart() { const cartProduct = useSelector((state) => state.cart); const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); let alltotal = 0; function handleIncrement(productId) { dispatch(incrementQuantity(productId)); } function handleDecrement(productId) { dispatch(decrementQuantity(productId)); } function HandleBuy() { navigate('/registrationform'); } return (
